bullet: Building and deploying serverless applications, managing API routing from front-end
Minimal configuration and using React vocabulary to have full-stack application with no server maintenance
Easily transferrable skillset to other serverless tools, like AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions
Writing and working with JAM stack applications
name: NextJS
desc: I have used NextJS a few times to familiarize myself with serverless architechture. I would consider myself reasonably acclimated to the workflow, and could easily set up and develop on projects using this structure.
